synopsis.text: Ge, a salted fish, resides with his aunt on a peculiar island, spending his days in a seemingly lackadaisical manner. Despite his propensity for clumsiness and a knack for attracting survival crises, Ge's unique approach to life endears him to the island's eccentric inhabitants. As he navigates through various part-time jobs, he forms unexpected bonds of friendship and family with those around him. As the island gears up for the annual Fish God Festival, a series of humorous and heartwarming adventures unfold, with Ge at the center of it all.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
